metadata.title: Obsidian Cruiser for Multiverse
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex, Kieve, Felipe, ConMan, Brightlord, R4V3-0N
metadata.description: Another classic mod, this one from Kieve. The original Obsidian Cruiser set standards of quality for ship mods back in the day. Thanks to the skilled artists in the Multiverse community and some fancy scripting, you can now have Retribution on the Rebels across every reality.
